current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To amend the statutory authorities of the Coast Guard to improve the quality of life for current and former Coast Guard personnel and their families, and for other purposes.

header.#text: Child development center standards and inspections
Child development center standards and inspections

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall require that each child development center meets applicable health and safety standards.
shall require that each child development center under this subchapter meets such safety standards as the
considers appropriate to ensure the health, safety, and welfare of the children and employees at the child development center.
shall provide for regular and unannounced inspections of each child development center under this subchapter to ensure compliance with this section.
